```{r}
load("ADaM.Rda")
str(ADaM)
library(patchwork)
```


```{r}
load("ADaM.Rda")

ADaM$birdorman <- as.factor(ADaM$birdorman)

str(ADaM)

p1 <- ADaM %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Amp1, y = Amp2, color = birdorman, label = id)) +
  geom_point() + 
  theme_minimal()

svmfit = svm(birdorman ~ .,
             data = ADaM,
             kernel = "polynomial",
             cost = 10,
             scale = FALSE)
                        
table(ADaM$birdorman, predict(svmfit))

p2 <- plot(svmfit, ADaM, Amp1~Amp2)

p1 + p2
```
